resources.string: We are a business located near the Greater Nashville area specializing in the growth and love of the musical arts. We are a place where new and upcoming artists can come to grow in their level of confidence and attempt to pursue a career in the music industry by creating a luanchpad for them. More than anything, we are business dedicated to the passion of music, whether a beginner looking to learn to sing, play an instrument or even learn to DJ or an aspiring artist looking for their next step.
